[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1503345026539{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]Doctors Hospital Sseguku provides specialised care to patients requiring close monitoring and a high level of interventions. The facility has a 3-bed capacity intensive care unit run by a dedicated and experienced team of respective specialists.

Our Intensive care unit is well equipped with several types of durable medical equipment such as ventilators, heart monitors, medicine pumps and many others that can keep patients safe, comfortable and provide full care to critically ill patients.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”5173″ img_size=”large”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”5175″ img_size=”large”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”5176″ img_size=”large”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
